sentences.en: After having been subjugated to ambition, your maternal instincts are at last starting to assert themselves.
sentences.cn: 你那被雄心壮志压制已久的母性本能终于开始展现出来。

sentences.en: After the war, the army made an attempt to assert its authority in the south of the country.
sentences.cn: 战后，军队试图在该国的南部地区维护其统治地位。

sentences.en: But the spirit has stirred and the nation has begun to assert itself.
sentences.cn: 但是精神已经振奋,这个民族已开始显示自己.

sentences.en: French cooking, she asserted, is the best in the world.
sentences.cn: 她坚称法国菜是世界上最好的。

sentences.en: I believe I may assert that they were really in possession of deep and growing happiness.
sentences.cn: 我相信我可以说他们真的得到深深的、与日俱增的幸福了.

sentences.en: I choose rather to hesitate my opinion than to assert it roundly.
sentences.cn: 我宁可犹疑地表示我的意见而不愿直率地断言这件事.

sentences.en: She continued to assert that she was innocent.
The defendants, who continue to assert their innocence, are expected to appeal.
sentences.cn: 各被告仍然坚称无辜，预计会提起上诉。

sentences.en: The enemy will invariably seek opportunities to assert himself.
sentences.cn: 敌人是一定要寻找机会表现他们自己的.

sentences.en: The extensive list of the assert methods can be found in the Simple Test documentation.
sentences.cn: assert函数列表可以在简单测试手册里发现.

sentences.en: The laws of historical development will assert themselves.
sentences.cn: 历史发展的规律是不可抗拒的.

sentences.en: The Nordic countries have been quick to assert their interest in the development of the Baltic States.
sentences.cn: 北欧诸国很快就表示它们对波罗的海诸国的发展感兴趣。

sentences.en: They are agitating to assert autonomy.
sentences.cn: 他们正在鼓吹实行自治。

sentences.en: To assert this is to denigrate the effectiveness of the police.
sentences.cn: 坚持这一点就是贬低警方的办事能力.

sentences.en: Unless the passion of it is to die down, it must somehow assert its universality.
sentences.cn: 除非爱情熄灭, 它会肯定自己的普遍性.

sentences.en: We assert that the Braun - Blanquet approach does not fall short.
sentences.cn: 我们坚信其它分类途径比之 Braun -Blanquet途径,仍然是有所不足.

words.tran_cn: 肯定的；独断的；坚定而自信的
断言，声明；主张，要求；坚持

phrases.tran_cn: 坚持自己的权利或意见

trans.tran_cn: 坚称，断言，维护，坚持，坚持主张，表现坚定
trans.tran_en: to state firmly that something is true
